half life but green

Uma boa expansão da Gearbox, simplesmente.

Digo que poderia ter sido melhor o personagem principal Adrian Shephard caçar o Gordon Freeman desde o começo mas também é interessante ver o que acontece na Black Mesa depois de Freeman ir para Xen.

Óbvio, não da para esperar "qualidade Valve" pois nem é um jogo deles e sim de terceiros, mas há sim coisas boas: As armas novas são bem interessantes, como a metralhadora leve, um Barnacle que serve de garra, mais alguns aliens que pode ser usado como arma igual a Hivehand e os Snarks.

Os "Black Ops" do Half-Life original (as assassinas) são agora inimigos também do H.E.C.U, o que sim é uma desculpa de ainda ter a IA dos H.E.C.U do Half-Life só que com uma nova skin sendo os Black Ops, mas também é interessante como história com "níveis de acobertamento", que até então era o próprio H.E.C.U.

Apesar que é mostrado o que acontece com a Black Mesa depois do Freeman ir para Xen, não é mostrado o real final dela, o que é um pouco estranho já que essa é a proposta.

Além do reuso dos Black Ops, algumas partes do Half-Life 1 também é reutilizada mas com outros propósitos, o que é interessante mas honestamente um pouco preguiçoso.

8/10 - É legal se você quer mais conteúdo de Half-Life, se já está satisfeito com o primeiro então nem precisa pegar esse.

An old-time FPS that offers players an intense, creative and disruptive experience. Compared to the original Half-Life, the firepower itself seems to have increased, and the proportion of high-tech weapons and alien weapons has increased. Sometimes it's hard to find your way. If Opposing Force was a recently released FPS, it would have given you real-time tips on finding clues on the map in areas where you might get lost or equipping Barnacles.

关于阿德里安·谢泼德的日记
3月3日 在基地里渡过了又一个枯燥而无聊的日子。在完结之际我很高兴，而我终于可以被分配一个任务。这里来了一个相当神秘的平民徘回在基地内。谣传他来自政府的部门，来这里吸纳雇员；别的说他与一些秘密的研究小组一起来。因为这个参与的机会我变得很兴奋。改变和冒险将会很棒。
3月3日

今天我终于见到了那个来自政府的人。我不肯定他是一个政府官员，但他穿着一套相当拘谨的衣服，还携带着一个公事包。在我看来他更像一个律师或是一个保验经纪。我注意到他打量着我。这天有好几次在训练的时候，我都发现他恰好观察着我。我很疑惑他到底想怎么样……

9月9日 好几周以来，日复一日我们的训练都同样是小菜一碟。今天我们在早晨练跑集合时，我们的教练告诉我们有一周的时间去成为室内战斗的专家。本周我们所有的时间都会在模拟战斗场所中渡过。至今我知道这是一项专门的训练，而且正常是不会在基地中教授。我想知道的这是否用来测试我们的适应能力，或者测试我们是否已准备好去参与特殊任务？时间会证明一切……

3月12日 自我们的室内战斗训练开始以来，谣言便已经满天飞。大部份我的战友都深信我们已准备好去参与任务。但对于这项任务的内容我们没有取得一致的意见。我到处都听到黑山研究基地这一个名字，但对于这个地方我一点资料都没有。谣言指有些高度机密的研究在那里进行。对我来说，这听来并不是很令人兴奋……

3月15日 那项谣言已经得到确认。我们的训练是为了在一个叫做黑山基地的科研基地进行的任务而设。我唯一知道的是那个地方是被一些科学家用作某种新型的研究。我不能想像我们需要些什么。今天我们被告知我们要准备好，并设想它将在明天发生。我不知道“它”是什么，但整件事情有点奇怪。这令我感到不安，我希望它不要发生；那项任务看来没有任何潜在且令人兴奋的因素。我颇期待某些更有可能发生战斗的东西。
praticamente uma continuação só que do lado inimigo

Игра хорошая. Я поиграл всего пару часов потому, что не понял куда идти дальше. Большой выбор оружия, которое можно получить с помощью (/impulse 101). Оружия заметно больше чем в HALF LIFE. Сюжета в ней почти нету, поиграть чисто для веселья, вместо фонаря, прибор ночного зрения. Пофикшены баги из прошлой халвы, обновлено качество текстур и изменены некоторые механики (незначительно). В самой игре играем за военного из первой части. Всем советую поиграть лишние 2 часа. На распродаже игра может стоить всего 20 с лишним рублей.
самый лучший аддон для халвы, тут больше экшена чем головоломок

I totally recommend this expansion, you play as Adrian Shepard (sorry if i spelled it wrong), a corporal in the US military which has been tasked to eliminate Gordon Freeman, after an accident in the helicopter, you have to go save yourself from the aliens.
The soldier AI is pretty good, they can help you with for example opening locked doors, healing, etc.
You also have more weapons in the arsenal.
Pretty much recommend this for anyone who has played Half Life before. 10/10

After having finished Half-Life 1 for the first time ever I jumped straight into this game expecting the same kind of fun that i had in there and my god did it even go over my expectations. It's great in the same way that it made the original amazing, it does not change the main gameplay tropes the main one follows nor does it improve anything. But it does add some new things like weapons and enemies.
So if you want some pros and cons then keep on reading, keep in mind almost all pros and cons remain the same so i won't go over them anymore.

Pros:
+ The prologue isn't as drawn out, it recognizes that you probably already know how the Black Mesa facility looks like and what it is so they don't show that anymore.
+ New weapons that were are fun to use and felt like they had some purpose. In total it adds 10 new weapons, it does also remove weapons but those get replaced by the new ones so to be honest that was perfectly fine to me.
+ A lot of new enemy types.
+ The last part of the game doesn't feel as annoying to play through. In the main game the last 20% was a slog to get through meanwhile in here it didn't feel annoying at all.
+ Story is unique and it's really fun to watch the main plot through someone else's eyes .

Cons:
- The same bugs/glitches that the main game suffered from are still here (mainly getting stuck in terrain and not closing properly).
- Instead of the flashlight you get a nightvission wich is really ugly and gave me a mild headache at times.
- When i closed the game and reopened it for later, my keybinds and mouse settings were reset.
- Some of the new enemy types are bulletsponges.

Summary:
I'd recommend this game to everyone that liked the main game since you're also going to love this. Honestly for 4€ i don't think you can go wrong so it's priced perfectly. Could be a controversial thing to say but this might be one of the best spin off games ever made.

Rating:
8.5/10

Uno dei migliori Half Life. Una campagna interessante e con tante novità (armi, nemici, meccaniche di gioco) e un multiplayer ancora attivo rendono questo gioco un must-play per i fan della saga ma anche per gli appassionati di fps

найс

Uma excelente expansão para o Half Life original, Opposing Force conta a história do soldado Adrian Shepard, um dos membros da equipe militar que tentou destruir Black Mesa, porém, a nossa história começa mais ou menos depois do Gordon Freeman ter fugido do local, tornando o Shepard o último sobrevivente que fugiu do laboratório Black Mesa. 

O jogo é super divertido, apresenta uma variedade imensa de armas, algumas mais fortes, e outras mais fracas, ele também apresenta uma dificuldade um tanto desafiadora se comparado ao seu antecessor. Cada momento da minha jogatina foi extremamente prazeroso e divertido, então se você nunca jogou, recomendo dar uma chance, pois a Valve nunca nos decepciona.

Great (if somewhat short) expansion pack to Half Life 1. New weapons, environments and enemies make this expansion good for those of us who want an extended stay at the Black Mesa Research Facility. The weapons, particularly the machinegun, make the gunplay more satisfying and finally you can command more followers.

I was never a big fan of this game. It never really added much to the overall Half Life story to me and I don't remember much about playing it except the final boss, which was kind of a mess. I'm hard pressed to name a Gearbox game that I've ever enjoyed, so I suppose there's that aspect to my opinion, too.
